title: Bonad, 1775–1825
description: First scene, figure in ocher-colored robe, and man in waistcoat on horse; man centered between two women, with chalice separating each; figure reclining in bed with two females standing at foot; man standing between two women; another figure in ocher-colored robe standing in door frame; woman in white gown. This panel represents the lost son, going off to foreign lands.
